# ESP32-S3 Partition Table for Scribe Pr: # - We use LittleFS as our actual filesystem (see platformio.ini: board_build.filesystem = littlefs)
# - The partition subtype MUST be "spiffs" (0x82) - this is ESP32's standard filesystem partition type
# - The partition name is "littlefs" to match what we actually use
# - This is NOT a mistake - ESP32 requires "spiffs" as subtype even when using LittleFS!
# - Factory App: 3MB (main firmware - larger than OTA version)
# - LittleFS: ~5MB (filesystem for web assets - much larger than OTA version)
# IMPORTANT: App partitions MUST start at 0x10000-aligned addresses on ESP32-S3
